meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christine Beauregard Ernest Bonner, Jr. Steve Kravitz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #789.

div.div:
Missing first nine clues.
Final Jeopardy! logo flashes on the game board's monitors instead of the show's logo.

td.p: Christine Beauregard, a librarian from Albany, New York
Ernest Bonner, Jr., a firefighter from Galveston, Texas
Steve Kravitz, a trust and estate attorney from West Palm Beach, Florida (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,300)

tr.td: ISLANDS
MOVIE TRIVIA
DRUG STORE
FOOTBALL
FLOWERS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_4_4', 'clue_DJ_4_4_stuck', '[The end-of-round signal sounds.]
(Alex: Oh! That wraps up the Double Jeopardy! Round and bad news for Ernie because he wounds up--winds up at -$200. And Steve, our champion, can sympathize with you; because he was nailed on our last program for failing to phrase a response correctly. Ernie, you\'re gonna wind up with our 3rd place prize; thank you very much, stay right where you are.)

(John Philip) Sousa

Chris
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Steve
Ernie
Chris
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Chris] I\'ll tell you what. That places me in an awkward situation because we can\'t credit you with extra money for being correct on both of them, which you are!)
...
(Alex: So, the, uh, capitals, of course, are Carson City, Charleston, Cheyenne, Columbia, Columbus, Concord; in the "S" category, Sacramento, Salem, Salt Lake City, Santa Fe, Springfield, and St. Paul, Minnesota.)
ChrisWhat is C and S?
$3,200
SteveWhat is A?
$4,000
C or S')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '1 of 2 letters that begins the names of 6 state capitals, more than any other')

tr.td: STATE CAPITALS
1 of 2 letters that begins the names of 6 state capitals, more than any other
Steve
Ernie
Chris
3-day champion: $35,400 + the Jeopardy! computer or box game
3rd place: a Smith Corona electric typewriter + the Jeopardy! computer or box game
2nd place: a weekend for 2 at La Costa Hotel and Spa + a set of golf clubs + the Jeopardy! computer or box game
Steve
Ernie
Chris

28 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W
(including 2 DDs)

6 R,
3 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
